titles: A letter unto Mr. Stubs in answer to his Oceana weighed, &c.
author: Harrington, James, 1611-1677.
notes: A reply to: Stubbe, Henry.  The common-wealth of Oceana put into the ballance, and found too light.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
